item.title: I got my license! + Baofeng UV82 reviewed
item.description: So, the big news is I got my General Amateur Operator’s Certificate of Competency! I attended the May 2022 HamCram event at the Chirstchurch branch of NZART, hosted by Mike Duncan ZL3MWD at the Christchurch clubrooms. The two-day session was going to happen earlier, but as with all things COVID-19 got in the way of it. I was already pretty well prepared for the exam, but it was a lot of fun to hang out and go over the material in a more directed way.
